name: plastic bag (vacuum packaging)
description: A small, open plastic bag.  Essentially trash.

name: Nazrin map
description: It is a map that shows where treasures and food are likely to be. Adds content to the map by using.

use_action.message: Added places on the map where food and treasure are likely to be.

name: 'Scarlet Magic'
description: Is the effect of this item a magic to blood dye the surroundings? It's perfect for changing rooms! (It will be filled slowly by keeping possession)

name: Teleport Gate
description: When you step into your surroundings, it will generate the terrain to be randomly teleported semi-permanently. You can not specify the location in detail, nor can you cancel the terrain. Use carefully.

name: 'Original Barrage'
description: Reiki, Akai, Kamiki, Magic ... It is the energy before it is converted into a barrage. It keeps being filled little by little by keeping possession.

name: wriggle bug
description: It seems that not all my abilities have been lost in this world. By using it, you can exercise the ability to manipulate insects.

name: The Hundred Medicine Box of Inoki
name_plural: The Hundred Medicine Box of Inoki
description: It is a bowl with a rose design. It has mysterious power, and drinking alcohol in this bowl can cure injuries and illnesses.

name: hyakuyasumasu sake
description: Sake enshrined in 'The Hundred Pills of Tochigi' will have the power to cure illness and injury.

name: enma-like doll
description: It is a cute enchanting doll who is playing. It is powered by magical power, and by possessing it is gradually filled with energy.

name: Mystia doll
description: It is a lovely Mystia Lorelei doll. It is powered by magical power, and by possessing it is gradually filled with energy.

name: Sagume doll
description: It is a lovely Sagume doll that blows. It is powered by magical power, and by possessing it is gradually filled with energy.

name: Hong Meiling
description: It was a gatekeeper. Apparently she was a vampire who was enshrined in a fairy tale.

name: Hong Meiling
description: It is a vampire resurrected by a blood ritual. Imprinted with loyalty, it will accompany you as a servant.

use_action.friendly_msg: When you fly away from your hand, the bats change shape with the fog and become human figures.
use_action.hostile_msg: The control of the magic did not go well, and the bat became an enemy!

name: Fairy maid
description: It was a fairy maid. Apparently she is a fairy-tale fairy and even a vampire.

name: コウモリ(妖精メイド)
description: It is a vampire resurrected by a blood ritual. Imprinted with loyalty and will follow you as a faithful servant. It can not be expected as a force because it is cowardly.

use_action.friendly_msg: When you fly away from your hand, the bats change shape with the fog and become a fairy figure.
use_action.hostile_msg: The control of the magic did not go well, and the bat became an enemy!

name: Hobgoblin
description: It was a Hobgoblin. Apparently he was a monster that Hobgoblin turned into a vampire.

name: Hobgoblin
description: It is a vampire resurrected by a blood ritual. I print out my loyalty and follow you as a faithful servant, but I can not expect it as a force because it is too warm.

use_action.friendly_msg: When you fly out of your hand, the bats change shape with the fog and become a hobgoblin.
use_action.hostile_msg: The control of the magic did not go well, and the bat became an enemy!

name: Patchouli Knowledge
description: It was an asthmatic patient. It seems that she was a monster who had turned into a vampire as she guessed from the ashes and artifacts.

name: Patchouli Knowledge
description: It is a vampire resurrected by a blood ritual. I was not able to brainwash a witch with high magic power, but I am relieved because I am ill because it is not amazing.

use_action.friendly_msg: When you fly away from your hand, the bats change shape with the fog and become human figures.
use_action.hostile_msg: The control of the magic did not go well, and the bat became an enemy!

name: Patchouli Knowledge
description: The physical weakness has been overcome and it has become a restless figure. But now she is a vampire. It will come back as many times as you wish.

name: Patchouli Knowledge
description: Mechanization of the respiratory system could cure asthma completely. She will fight with you with your own will to pay back.

use_action.friendly_msg: When you fly away from your hand, the bats change shape with the fog and become human figures.
use_action.hostile_msg: The control of the magic did not go well, and the bat became an enemy!

name: little devil
description: It was a little devil. Well, it's strange that the devil is ashes... maybe it was a vampire?

name: little devil
description: It is a vampire resurrected by a blood ritual. Imprinted with loyalty and will follow you as a faithful servant.

use_action.friendly_msg: When you fly away from your hand, the bats change shape with the fog and become human figures.
use_action.hostile_msg: The control of the magic did not go well, and the bat became an enemy!

name: Sakuya Izayoi
description: It was the maid's chief. Apparently she was a vampire who was enshrined in a fairy tale.

name: Sakuya Izayoi
description: It is a vampire resurrected by a blood ritual. Imprint your loyalty and follow you as a perfect and humble follower.

use_action.friendly_msg: When you fly away from your hand, the bats change shape with the fog and become human figures.
use_action.hostile_msg: The control of the magic did not go well, and the bat became an enemy!

name: Sakuya Izayoi (cooking)
description: It is a maid head equipped with cooking utensils. I will cook various dishes for you.

name: Remilia Scarlet
description: It is the dead vampire's ashes. With the proper scientific knowledge, you will be able to revive your servant.

name: Remilia Scarlet
description: It is a vampire resurrected by a blood ritual.  Imprinted with loyalty and will follow you as a servant.

use_action.friendly_msg: When you fly away from your hand, the bats change shape with the fog and become human figures.
use_action.hostile_msg: The control of the magic did not go well, and the bat became an enemy!

name: Flandre Scarlet
description: It is the dead vampire's ashes. With the proper scientific knowledge, you will be able to revive your servant.

name: Flandre Scarlet
description: It is a vampire resurrected by a blood ritual.  Imprinted with loyalty and will follow you as a servant.
